@josharian Congrats and many happy days.
For purposes of the bacon field trip I'm declaring foie gras an equivalent of bacon and concomitantly that dinner at La Folie was a success.
The cardamom gelato, while strictly speaking not a pork product, was quite tasty and a refreshing counterpoint to the hog.
Bacon field trip stage 1 complete.  Muffuletta sandwich and salumi cone at Baccalone in the Ferry Building Marketplace.
Going on a bacon field trip for 4th of July weekend.  Mmm.  Bacon.
Kindle DX is awesome.  Already loaded up with PDFs of technical papers.  If I had only had one of these babies in grad school...
Eagerly awaiting delivery of a Kindle DX.  Two new gadgets in one week == goodness.
My desire to own Palm Pre has almost completely waned after failing to secure one before purchasing a new iPhone.  Schade.
Back to the Saturday routine.  Starting with breakfast at Gunther's.  Book store up next.  Home is good.
Got a new 3Gs at the subsidized price.  Thanks AT&T for doing the right thing for iPhone fans.
Come on AT&T.  Why are you charging existing customers $200 more than newbies to get a 3Gs?  Lame lame lame.
Snow Leopard.  Awesome.  iPhone OS 3.0.  Awesome.  iPhone 3Gs.  Awesome.  AT&T's lack of MMS and tethering.  Umm.  Not awesome.
No Pre's where I'm at.  I may lose interest depending on what's announced at WWDC today.  Advice: don't have shortages if you're not #1.
Nobuyuki Tsujii took the Gold at the Cliburn.  He gave a bunch of great performances.  His 2nd mvmt of the Rach 2 was really impressive.
On plane.  With baby.  God help us all.
[michael jackson's middle name] is better on Bing than Google.  Bing has sitelinks for smurf.com on [smurfs].  Bing FTW on 80's pop icons.
